trends: There have been 15 other sightings in Langhorne
There were no other sightings in Langhorne on or around October 5th 2013
Summary: Very bright, round object in low horizon in Southwest sky
divs: Sighting DetailsIn the springtime 2013 I had been recurrently awoken at 4:08am night after night for three or four nights. I had nosebleeds occurring concurrently. It flet like something was "stuck" up my nose, left side, and I felt the need to keep working at it. Then after a couple of days a very small object came out of my nostril and was no bigger than one-sixteenth of an inch. Very, very small it was. Upon closer inspection by me, it was a symmetrically shaped pointed object on both ends. It flet like an ivory colored piece of plastic. Below you will find a sketch of the shape of this. Remember, it was much, much smaller than the sketch. I want you to have this in case anyone else ever has the same experience and brings it to your attention so you will have collaborating story. Also, I mentioned a very round, very bright object in the low horizon in the Southwest sky visible from my Langhorne home. I had seen it in Spring 2013. It was evident last night, too.
